lines.text: The Ambassador at large, here to see how we're winning the war.
Would you believe what I told you?
Would you believe what they told you?
[On her knees to pick something up, Cherry looks up to find Dodger towering over her]
Hi. We're locked out. What is it?
The Lock seems to be malfunctioning.
[Dodger levels his M-60 at the door and cocks it, about to fire]
Dodger! Civilization baby. You can't just blow the door away.
[after a moment Dodger takes the butt of his M-60 and smashes the door open instead]
